song.title: Longing To Belong
song.lyrics:
I'm falling harder then I've ever fell before Im falling fast while hoping I'll land in your arms Cause all my time is spent here Longing to belong to you
I dream of circles perfect eyes within your face My hearts an open wound that only you'd replace And though the moon is risin can't put your picture down Love can be frightning when you fall
And when the time is right I hope that you'll respond Like when the wind gets tired the ocean becomes calm I may be dreaming but I'm longing to belong to you
